version_description:
Improved overall stability.
Fixed a crash when receiving phone calls.
Added a missing module in Rock bundle.
Can process both left and right input channels.

Improved overall stability.
Fixed a crash when receiving phone calls.
Added a missing module in Rock bundle.
Can process both left and right input channels.

Fixed a graphic bug in mic positioning.
Improved stability when changing cabinets in the Rig Player.
Fixed an app crash on some audio interfaces.
Fixed a graphic issue in the split sound chain.

Fixed a graphic bug in mic positioning.
Improved stability when changing cabinets in the Rig Player.
Fixed an app crash on some audio interfaces.
Fixed a graphic issue in the split sound chain.

- Added Mute button
Fixes:
- compatibility issues with some audio interfaces
- two broken rigs in the BHS Sold library
- Rig Player locked rigs issue
- problem in inserting effects at the end of a split chain

- Added Mute button
Fixes:
- compatibility issues with some audio interfaces
- two broken rigs in the BHS Sold library
- Rig Player locked rigs issue
- problem in inserting effects at the end of a split chain

Fixes:
- missing Bogie JPC2 rigs
- missing Mode switch in the Splitter
- link to Store from rig lists
Improves overall stability

Fixes:
- missing Bogie JPC2 rigs
- missing Mode switch in the Splitter

Improves overall stability

- All Amps & Cabs Bundle
- Choptones Archer 100W and Brit 900 2C EL34 Rig Libraries

- All Amps & Cabs Bundle
- Choptones Archer 100W and Brit 900 2C EL34 Rig Libraries

Fixes:
- Silent output on some audio interfaces
- Fixed rig knobs not updating
- Broken presets when using the Save As function with the Rig Player in the chain
- Flickering issue when moving the Wham-me pedal

Fixes:
- Silent output on some audio interfaces
- Fixed rig knobs not updating
- Broken presets when using the Save As function with the Rig Player in the chain
- Flickering issue when moving the Wham-me pedal

AUv3 format included to embed the full TH-U processing into your DAW audio projects.
Added 6 new Rig Libraries.
Bug fixings.
